Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 16 of the Lakers' 21 points in the fourth quarter, leading a 21-0 run.
Pre-Game Insights: The Kings did not address known issues such as lack of size and defense.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Mike Brown faced criticism for his rotations and play-calling in the fourth quarter.
Monte McNair and crew are aware of the team's issues but have not addressed them effectively.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alex Len and Trey Lyles were on the floor together during the fourth quarter and looked terrible.
DeMar DeRozan and De' Aaron Fox missed several shots during the fourth quarter collapse.
